ROM.Changelog:
### Let's AIM-ify
* Merged March 2020 ASB in ROM * Updated blobs from picmt * Upstreamed kernel to LA.BR.1.2.9.c26-00600-8x09.0 with Linux 3.10.108 (EOL) * Upstreamed prima to LA.BR.1.3.7.c25-07400-8976.0
### Currently known issues
* Despite having stock bluetooth blobs, bluetooth MAC will be randomized every boot (failed attempt to decrypt?). * WiFi MAC address decryption with libwcnss_qmi seldom to work.
---
### Note:
_Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without a proper evidences such as logcat screenshots etc. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._
